assets.description: The native token of SGE Network
assets.extended_description: The Sports, Gaming, and Entertainment Network (SGE Network) is a Cosmos SDK-based layer-1 blockchain that uses its own native utility token (SGE Token). The SGE Network leverages the modular components, blockchain interoperability and minimal gas fees of the Cosmos-based design to support applications at the intersection of blockchain, sports, gaming and entertainment that are pioneering novel ways of engaging users with a UX, value proposition and utility never before seen in the space.
assets.name: SGE
